## ClassMembersMap.addMembers() method

Add class members as values of this map, using standard keys.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addMembers(members: readonly ClassMemberImpl[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  members | readonly [ClassMemberImpl](./ts-morph-structures.classmemberimpl.md)<!-- -->\[\] | the class members to add. |

**Returns:**

void
